name: Achievement Hunter: Spinner Edition
description:
Achievement Hunter: Spinner Edition is a game about Spinner, one of the most popular topics in 2017. The game features a nice bonus of 5000 achievements.

The main character of the game is Spinner Pete. Through the magic portal you have reached the Vape Kingdom, in which at every corner lies danger, in the form of saws, stakes, various dark creatures who will try to stop you. The main goal of the game is to get out of the forest and collect all 5000 achievements.

The game is made in the style of clip art.

Features:
- 5000 achievements
- Minimum allowable price
- Clip art style
- Charismatic heroes and a lot of smoke
